content: ESPN will let their personalities rip on Trump all they want (which is fine), but I don’t like the hypocrisy of disciplining Schilling for doing the same. I for one would much rather we did stick to sports. I can’t even look at Facebook anymore without a nonstop barrage of pro-liberal/anti-Trump posts. I don’t care about a Ringer writer’s political opinion anymore than cousin Susie’s. I go to FB to see what people are up to, not what they’re bitching about and I come to the Ringer for sports and entertainment articles. If I wanted a constant stream of far left editorializing, I can just as easily click on CNN or Huffington Post.
